sentence.Network_en: He is currently being held in a metropolitan correctional center.
sentence.Network_cn: 他现在被关在一个大城市的改造中心。

sentence.Network_en: The Federal Marshals took me away in handcuffs to the Santa Fe County Adult Correctional Facility.
sentence.Network_cn: 我戴着手铐,被联邦执法官带往圣菲县成人管教所.

sentence.Network_en: Since then she has done all the reforming that any correctional institution could desire.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来她已改过自新,任何感化机构也该满意了.
